title: MD
biography:
Omesh is both a given name and a surname. Notable people with the name include:Omesh Kumar Bharti, Indian field epidemiologist
Omesh Wijesiriwardene, Sri Lankan cricketer
Ananda Omesh, Indonesian actor
aiSummary: Omesh Bharti is a rabies elimination specialist with an H-index of 13 at Rabies Control Programs (Member). Has been published in The Lancet regional health. Southeast Asia, Asian journal of transfusion science, The Journal of veterinary medical science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
